--mbx-inputbox-background-light.description: Input background when dark mode is off

--mbx-inputbox-background-dark.description: Input background when dark mode is on

--mbx-inputbox-text-color-light.description: Input text color when dark mode is off

--mbx-inputbox-text-color-dark.description: Input text color when dark mode is on

--mbx-inputbox-background-hover-light.description: Input background when dark mode is off, on hover

--mbx-inputbox-background-hover-dark.description: Input background when dark mode is on, on hover

--mbx-inputbox-text-color-hover-light.description: Input text color when dark mode is off, on hover

--mbx-inputbox-text-color-hover-dark.description: Input text color when dark mode is on, on hover
